text: Fatburger is an American fast casual dining restaurant chain. They have milkshakes, hamburgers, French fries and more. ==The history== Fatburger was established in Los Angeles by Lovie Yancey in 1947. It was not until the 1990s that the Fatburger began expanding out of California. The company was mentioned in rap lyrics. Those include "It was a Good Day" from Ice Cube in 1992. ==References== Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:1947 establishments in the United States Category:American restaurants
title: Fatburger
